basics.name: Carlos D. Niño R.
basics.label: Full Stack Angular .NET /Electronic Engineer/Automation Projects Designer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack web developer with solid experience in backend development (.NET 7, .NET 9, .NET Core 5 with C# and Entity Framework Core) and frontend development (Angular, React, Bootstrap, Sass). My expertise includes configuring streaming APIs (Jellyfin), integrating services, manage databases with SQL and the use of Git. As an electronics engineer, I also bring significant experience from the industrial sector, where I've designed electrical panels for automation and control, supervised industrial plant maintenance (PLCs, boilers, effluent systems), and programmed HMI interfaces. This diverse background allows me to offer a comprehensive perspective on technology projects in various environments.I'm a full stack web developer with solid experience in backend development (.NET 7, .NET 9, .NET Core 5 with C# and Entity Framework Core) and frontend development (Angular, React, Bootstrap, Sass). My expertise includes configuring streaming APIs (Jellyfin), integrating services, manage databases with SQL and the use of Git. As an electronics engineer, I also bring significant experience from the industrial sector, where I've designed electrical panels for automation and control, supervised industrial plant maintenance (PLCs, boilers, effluent systems), and programmed HMI interfaces. This diverse background allows me to offer a comprehensive perspective on technology projects in various environments.

location.address: El Cují sector Los Robles Calle 1 con Carrera 1

work.name: Moovimi
work.summary: Maintain and customize changes to the Jellyfin-based streaming API using .Net 7 & .Net 9. This includes configuration and modification of EndPoints and source code to adapt it to the specific needs of the streaming application. This was a part-time, remote role.
highlights: Maintained and customized Jellyfin-based streaming API with .Net 7 & .Net 9
Configured and modified API EndPoints
Adapted source code to meet specific streaming application requirements

work.name: Independent Contractor
work.summary: Design of electrical boards for automation and control of industrial processes, including programming HMI interfaces for embedded systems.
highlights: Implemented effluent recovery systems -OGS Atlas/Orica, Peru
Modernized control system for a cement-based tile adhesive mixing and bagging plant - Interpego, Venezuela
Programmed HMI interfaces for embedded systems - DPI Ingenieria, Venezuela
PETN Drying Plant Enginering - OGS Atlas/Orica, Peru
Emulsifier Flow Control System - OGS Atlas/Orica - Peru

work.name: Acrilum
work.summary: Supervision, coordination, and planning of maintenance procedures for various industrial equipment, including Chiller, Boiler, Bridge Crane, Profiles polisher, and effluent treatment plant. Also responsible for training personnel and supervising contractor activities.
highlights: Supervised and coordinated maintenance for key industrial equipment (Chiller, Boiler, Bridge Crane, etc.)
Trained personnel in maintenance and operation of machinery
Planned and supervised activities performed by contractors

work.name: Acrilum
work.summary: Analyst in the production area of the aluminum profile anodizing line. Responsibilities included personnel supervision, system operation (Alumaster, boiler, waste water purification), control and register of production/supplies, and maintenance of electric/electronic boards.
highlights: Supervised personnel in maintenance and production tasks
Operated and maintained critical systems including Alumaster control, Boiler, and Waste Water Purification plant
Controlled and registered production and necessary supplies
Trained newly entered company personnel

work.name: Alianza Capitales
work.summary: Full stack development using Frontend: React, Chakra UI, WebPack, Formik, TypesScript, Redux Toolkit, and Backend: .NET Core 5 (C#), Entity Framework Core, SQL Server. Designed and developed functional components, views, and integrated backend and frontend services. This was a part-time, remote role.
highlights: Developed Frontend with React, Chakra UI, and TypeScript
Developed Backend with .NET Core 5 (C#) and SQL Server
Designed and developed functional components and views
Integrated Backend and Frontend services

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Repairs of domestic and industrial electronic equipment under direct agreement with clients.
highlights: Repaired a wide range of domestic electronic equipment
Repaired industrial electronic equipment under client agreement

work.name: Founduss
work.summary: FrontEnd development using Angular, Angular Material, Bootstrap, and Sass. Created views, functionalities, and services, integrated existing views with the BackEnd, and assured code quality through manual testing. This was a temporary contract, remote role.
highlights: Developed Frontend with Angular, Angular Material, and Sass
Created views, functionalities, and services
Integrated views with the BackEnd
Assured code quality through manual testing

work.name: Ingenieria DPI C.A
work.summary: Industrial electronic equipment repair (Inverters, PLC's, Controlers, Power Sources, Servers, UPS). Also responsible for electric boards assembly and design, data/voice network installation, CCTV, and design of middle complexity electronic circuits.
highlights: Repaired industrial electronic equipment (Inverters, PLC's, Controlers)
Assembled and designed electric boards
Installed data and voice networks, and CCTV systems
Designed middle complexity electronic circuits (Voltage Protector, automation Relays)

work.name: Universidad Nacional Experimental Politécnica 'Antonio José de Sucre'
work.summary: General maintenance of hardware and software for CAD stations and Plotter. Included software/hardware installation, general PC maintenance, use of CAD software (Autocad, Inventor, Solidworks), drawing up plans, 3D modeling, and elaboration of teaching guides.
highlights: Maintained hardware and software for CAD stations and Plotter
Performed general PC and component maintenance (RAM, HDD)
Utilized and provided support for CAD software (Autocad, Inventor, Solidworks)
Drew up plans and performed 3D modeling

work.name: Manufacturas Generales GEMACA
work.summary: Intern in the area of electromechanical maintenance of HDPE extruders in production lines of plastic pipes. Tasks included maintenance of conveyors, air conditioner, Chillers, water pump systems, electric boards, and basic plumbing/wiring installation.
highlights: Maintained electromechanical equipment for HDPE extruders
Performed maintenance on Chillers, water pump systems, and electric boards
Assisted with wiring installation and basic plumbing
Awarded 'Volunteer of the Month'

projects.name: EMR-Cloud
projects.description: Project under development for the control of medical records. The frontend is being built with Angular 19, Tailwind, and PrimeNG. The backend uses a REST API with .Net8, Entity Framework, and SQL Server.
highlights: Frontend: Angular 19, Tailwind CSS, PrimeNG
Backend: .Net8, Entity Framework, SQL Server
Architecture: REST API

projects.name: MNGTools
projects.description: App prototype for managing tool inventory in an industrial plant. Developed using the Next.js framework with Firebase for database and authentication.
highlights: Framework: Next.js
Database/Auth: Firebase
Language: TypeScript
UI:Shadcn

projects.name: ANFO Emulsion plant electrical & automation design
projects.description: Electrical And automation desing of an ANFO emulsion plant in conjunction with OGS Atlas and Dyno Nobel USA.
highlights: Automation: Desing of the automation control system, compose of a SIEMENS S7 1500 PLC, 2 control boxes an 3 HMI for process control
Electrical: Desing of the 10KV Middle tension Sub-station and grounding grid, Lighting and services panels, electrical distribution system
Tecnologies: AutoCad, Revit, Dialux.

projects.name: FranklinGT
projects.description: Website for controlling online tournaments held by an influencer. Involved creation of the app and subsequent migrations through different versions of Angular (12 to 18).
highlights: Frontend: Angular 12-18
Database: Firebase
Scope: Web app for tournament control and multi-version migration

projects.name: PETN Drying Plant Engineering
projects.description: Design of a grounding system and lightning protection. Design of an electrical lighting system. Design of a distribution panel. Design of a control and automation panel for 4 drying lines. Design of a pneumatic control system panel.
highlights: Designed grounding and lightning protection systems
Designed control and automation panel for 4 drying lines

projects.name: Profile Preheating Oven for Electrostatic Painting
projects.description: Design of an electric oven for preheating aluminum profiles prior to electrostatic painting. Included control for conveyor belt advancement and temperature control with electric resistances.
highlights: Designed electric preheating oven
Implemented control systems for temperature and conveyor belt speed

projects.name: Emulsifier Flow Control System - Orica Peru
projects.description: Collaboration on technical advice for the design of a control and automation system, sensor selection, and preparation of control and process flow diagrams.
highlights: Provided technical consulting on control system design
Sensor selection and diagram elaboration

projects.name: Effluent Recovery Systems - PETN Plant
projects.description: Design of control panels for pump, hydropneumatic, and level management in tanks for the effluent recovery system of a PETN plant (Orica Peru).
highlights: Designed control panels for pump and tank level management
Focus on effluent recovery systems

projects.name: Control for Dust Extraction System - Automatic Aluminum Polisher
projects.description: Electrical panel for motor control and purging of dust particles detached during the aluminum profile polishing process at the Acrilum plant.
highlights: Designed electrical panel for motor control and dust purging

projects.name: Electrical Connection for Electrostatic Painting Plant and Generator Backup
projects.description: Design of a distribution panel for an electrostatic painting plant (Capacity 1000A 220V 60Hz). Included connection of critical equipment with a 250kVA electric generator backup.
highlights: Designed 1000A distribution panel
Integrated 250kVA generator for critical equipment backup

projects.name: Implementation of Generic Control Card for Inter Voltage Stabilizer
projects.description: Designed and built a generic control card adaptable to defunct voltage stabilizers used by Inter in Venezuela for TV/Internet transmission amplifiers. This allowed the company to reuse a batch of 50 faulty units, preserving expensive components.
highlights: Designed and built a generic control PCB
Recovered a batch of 50 faulty voltage stabilizer units

projects.name: Design of an Alternator Relay
projects.description: Designed a commercial model of an alternator relay, a device that sequentially activates a group of 2 or 3 loads. Included electronic circuit design, PCB design, prototype manufacturing, and validation testing.
highlights: Designed and manufactured a marketable alternator relay prototype
Included circuit and PCB design

projects.name: Design of a Level Control Relay
projects.description: Designed a conductivity-based level relay with indication for four liquid levels via LEDs and an NC/NO relay output. Included circuit design, PCB design, prototype construction, and validation testing.
highlights: Designed conductivity-based level control relay
Developed prototype with 4-level LED indication

projects.name: Design and Implementation of an Over-frequency Protection Relay for Invegas/Praxair
projects.description: Designed an electronic board to measure the fundamental electrical frequency at a variable frequency drive (VFD) output. The device disables the VFD and shuts down the motor if the maximum frequency value, determined by process regulations, is exceeded. Successfully implemented at the Invegas plant.
highlights: Designed over-frequency protection circuit for VFDs
Successfully implemented at Invegas plant

skillsUsed: Design of measurement circuits using discrete components
Mathematical modeling of motors and electronic components
